title: Move customer name & mobile form to app start screen

requirements.summary: Remove Customer and Mobile columns from DoorList table, showing only Sr, Size, and pricing columns
acceptanceCriteria: DoorList table no longer renders Customer or Mobile columns
Table header row does not include Customer or Mobile headings
Each door entry row only shows Sr, Size, and coating price columns

file_operations.description: Remove Customer and Mobile column headers from the table header row. Remove the corresponding table data cells that render customerName and mobileNumber from each door entry row. Keep only Sr, Size, and the four coating price columns (Single, Double, Laminate, Double Sagwanpatti) in both the header and body rows.

requirements.summary: Add customer info entry screen at app start to collect name and mobile before door entry
acceptanceCriteria: On first load, a customer info screen is shown with fields for customer name and mobile number
User cannot reach the door entry form until they submit the customer info screen
Submitting the customer info screen stores the name and mobile in app state and navigates to the door entry / door list view
The stored customer name and mobile number are still passed through to the quotation view and WhatsApp share output

file_operations.description: Create a new component that renders a customer information entry form with two text input fields (customer name and mobile number) and a Continue/Start button. Use shadcn/ui Input and Button components for consistent styling. The component should accept onSubmit callback prop that receives the customer name and mobile number values. Include basic validation to ensure both fields are filled before allowing submission. Style the form with the app's amber/gold theme to match the existing design system.

Add a new state variable to track whether customer info has been submitted (e.g., hasCustomerInfo boolean). Conditionally render the CustomerInfoForm component when hasCustomerInfo is false, preventing access to the door entry form and door list. When the customer info form is submitted, set hasCustomerInfo to true, store the customerName and mobileNumber in the existing state, and display the main door entry interface. Ensure the existing customerName and mobileNumber state variables continue to be passed to QuotationView and used in the WhatsApp formatter. Import and wire the new CustomerInfoForm component at the top of the render method before the existing form/quotation view conditional.
